_header: Take the crop of red briar
Title(s): All maner herbys gode for potage
_description: ‘All maner herbys gode for potage’ — 13 lines in couplets extracted from the Liber Cure Cocorum

CamMagPep1047.First Lines:
Take the croppe of rede brereRede nettyll croppe and avance
                    also…
CamMagPep1047.Last Lines:
…Then wynter hys cowrse schall holdeIn lent seson porray be
                    bolde
CamMagPep1047.Attributed Title: All maner herbys gode for potage (f. 16)

                        ed.
